text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I went all out and kept adding 
stuff to my honey drink order～♪ 
Whipped cream, syrup, cinnamon～……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…… Maybe that's too much calories? 
Now that I think about it, I ate crepes 
yesterday too……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh well! 
I'll just have to train more tomorrow.
